review: I like that it is easy to navigate through the apps. Easier than other streaming devices I have used, but it definitely has some bugs. It needs to be rebooted frequently due to streaming issues which means you lose some settings and they have to be re-installed. We end up using our Blue-ray player to watch Netflix and even Amazon prime because the show will stop streaming. I know we have a good Wi-fi connection so it should work fine.
author: Jamie Yates "Kip Yates"

review: Incredibly easy to use. Set up was very quick and simple, and I'm not even good with technology. I haven't tried any games or many of the apps yet but it works great for everything I bought it for. Definitely worth the money.
